name: Horse - A horse racing betting game
name_original: Horse - A horse racing betting game
description:
A horse racing betting game where you test your luck at betting winning horses.

Odds reflect the people's sentiments regarding a horse. The lower the odds, the more likely the horse is better performing.

BET TYPES:

Win = You receive payout if your win-candidate finishes 1st place.

Place = You receive payout if your place-candidate finishes 1st or 2nd place.

Show = You receive payout if your show-candidate finishes 1st, 2nd, or 3rd place.

CONTROLS:

Left mouse button click does everything

Left click a selected bet again to remove bet selection

Esc = quit game

m = mute music

space = pause the game anytime
